name: DailyMoodBooster
0:
”Alexa, open daily mood boost”
”Alexa, launch daily mood boost”
”Alexa, boost my mood with daily mood boost”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily mood boost
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mood Booster is an innovative Alexa skill designed to help users improve their mood and mindset through customized positive affirmations. By simply telling Alexa your current mood, Mood Booster will generate a unique affirmation to help you reframe your thoughts, overcome challenges, and embrace positivity. Start your day with a motivational boost or unwind after a long day with a calming affirmation - Mood Booster is here to support your mental well-being every step of the way.



How to add Mood Booster as a Routine

Adding Mood Booster to your daily routine is easy and can bring a positive impact to your everyday life. After launching the Mood Booster skill, follow these simple steps to add Mood Booster as a routine on your Alexa-enabled device:


1. Navigate to “More Settings” then select “Routines” 

2. Press the “+” button to add a Routine

3. Set a name for your Routine (for example “MoodBooster”)

4. Select “When this happens” 

5. Select “Schedule”

6. You can choose Sunrise, Sunset, or a specific time you want the skill to open at 


Now you're all set to enjoy daily personalized affirmations on your Alexa-enabled device. With Mood Booster as part of your routine, you'll start each day with the right mindset to conquer your goals and challenges. Let's make every day a better day with Mood Booster!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
